languages.text: "Слишком... много красок. Цвета пестрят, перебивают друг друга, сливаются в единую волну. Она вот-вот захлестнет!.." {n}Леди-Навигатор прикрывает глаза руками, словно от света палящей звезды.{/n} "Простите, но сейчас я не в силах утолить ваш интерес. Быть может, позже".

traits.locale_text: "Слишком... много красок. Цвета пестрят, перебивают друг друга, сливаются в единую волну. Она вот-вот захлестнет!.." {n}Леди-Навигатор прикрывает глаза руками, словно от света палящей звезды.{/n} "Простите, но сейчас я не в силах утолить ваш интерес. Быть может, позже".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Too... Too many colours. The hues flicker and intersperse, merging into a single wave. It's about to crash!" {n}The Lady Navigator presses her hands to her eyes as if to shield them from the light of a burning star.{/n} "Forgive me, but I cannot satisfy your curiosity at this time. Perhaps later."
languages.original_text: "Слишком... много красок. Цвета пестрят, перебивают друг друга, сливаются в единую волну. Она вот-вот захлестнет!.." {n}Леди-Навигатор прикрывает глаза руками, словно от света палящей звезды.{/n} "Простите, но сейчас я не в силах утолить ваш интерес. Быть может, позже".

Perhaps later."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “颜色太……太多了，无数色彩闪烁着，穿插着，仿佛波浪一般。那些颜色要崩溃了！”{n}卡西娅用双手捂住了眼睛，仿佛想要挡住熊熊燃烧的恒星爆发出的刺眼光芒。{/n}“请原谅我，但我现在无法满足你的好奇心。或许下次再说吧。”
languages.original_text: "Too... Too many colours. The hues flicker and intersperse, merging into a single wave. It's about to crash!" {n}The Lady Navigator presses her hands to her eyes as if to shield them from the light of a burning star.{/n} "Forgive me, but I cannot satisfy your curiosity at this time. Perhaps later."

traits.locale_text: “颜色太……太多了，无数色彩闪烁着，穿插着，仿佛波浪一般。那些颜色要崩溃了！”{n}卡西娅用双手捂住了眼睛，仿佛想要挡住熊熊燃烧的恒星爆发出的刺眼光芒。{/n}“请原谅我，但我现在无法满足你的好奇心。或许下次再说吧。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Too... Too many colours. The hues flicker and intersperse, merging into a single wave. It's about to crash!" {n}The Lady Navigator presses her hands to her eyes as if to shield them from the light of a burning star.{/n} "Forgive me, but I cannot satisfy your curiosity at this time. Perhaps later."

languages.text: «Demasiados... demasiados colores. Los tonos destellan y se mezclan, creando una sola ola. ¡Va a chocar!». {n}La Lady Navegante se tapa los ojos como si quisiera protegerlos de la luz de una estrella.{/n} «Lo lamento, pero no puedo satisfacer su curiosidad ahora. Más adelante, tal vez».
languages.original_text: "Too... Too many colours. The hues flicker and intersperse, merging into a single wave. It's about to crash!" {n}The Lady Navigator presses her hands to her eyes as if to shield them from the light of a burning star.{/n} "Forgive me, but I cannot satisfy your curiosity at this time. Perhaps later."

traits.locale_text: «Demasiados... demasiados colores. Los tonos destellan y se mezclan, creando una sola ola. ¡Va a chocar!». {n}La Lady Navegante se tapa los ojos como si quisiera protegerlos de la luz de una estrella.{/n} «Lo lamento, pero no puedo satisfacer su curiosidad ahora. Más adelante, tal vez».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あまりにも…色が多すぎます。色彩が明滅し、交錯し、一つの波に混ぜ合わされる。壊れてしまいそうなほどに！」{n}航宙士は、燃える星の光から目を守るように両手で目を押さえる。{/n}「お許しください、今はあなたの好奇心を満たすことはできません。またの機会にお願いします」
languages.original_text: "Too... Too many colours. The hues flicker and intersperse, merging into a single wave. It's about to crash!" {n}The Lady Navigator presses her hands to her eyes as if to shield them from the light of a burning star.{/n} "Forgive me, but I cannot satisfy your curiosity at this time. Perhaps later."

traits.locale_text: 「あまりにも…色が多すぎます。色彩が明滅し、交錯し、一つの波に混ぜ合わされる。壊れてしまいそうなほどに！」{n}航宙士は、燃える星の光から目を守るように両手で目を押さえる。{/n}「お許しください、今はあなたの好奇心を満たすことはできません。またの機会にお願いします」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Zu ... zu viele Farben. Die Töne flackern und vermischen sich, verschmelzen zu einer einzigen Welle. Sie bricht gleich!" {n}Die Navigatorin presst sich die Hände vor die Augen, wie um sie vor dem Licht eines brennenden Sterns zu schützen.{/n} "Verzeiht mir, doch ich kann Eure Neugier im Augenblick nicht stillen. Vielleicht später."
languages.original_text: "Too... Too many colours. The hues flicker and intersperse, merging into a single wave. It's about to crash!" {n}The Lady Navigator presses her hands to her eyes as if to shield them from the light of a burning star.{/n} "Forgive me, but I cannot satisfy your curiosity at this time. Perhaps later."

traits.locale_text: "Zu ... zu viele Farben. Die Töne flackern und vermischen sich, verschmelzen zu einer einzigen Welle. Sie bricht gleich!" {n}Die Navigatorin presst sich die Hände vor die Augen, wie um sie vor dem Licht eines brennenden Sterns zu schützen.{/n} "Verzeiht mir, doch ich kann Eure Neugier im Augenblick nicht stillen. Vielleicht später."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Trop... Trop de couleurs. Les nuances vacillent et s'entremêlent pour former une seule et unique vague. Elle va s'écraser ! » {n}La navigatrice met les mains devant ses yeux, comme pour se protéger de l'éclat d'une étoile ardente.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, mais je ne peux pas satisfaire votre curiosité pour le moment. Peut-être plus tard. »
languages.original_text: "Too... Too many colours. The hues flicker and intersperse, merging into a single wave. It's about to crash!" {n}The Lady Navigator presses her hands to her eyes as if to shield them from the light of a burning star.{/n} "Forgive me, but I cannot satisfy your curiosity at this time. Perhaps later."

traits.locale_text: « Trop... Trop de couleurs. Les nuances vacillent et s'entremêlent pour former une seule et unique vague. Elle va s'écraser ! » {n}La navigatrice met les mains devant ses yeux, comme pour se protéger de l'éclat d'une étoile ardente.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, mais je ne peux pas satisfaire votre curiosité pour le moment. Peut-être plus tard. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Çok... Çok fazla renk var. Renk tonları titreşip birbirine karışıyor, tek bir dalga hâlini alıyorlar. Çarpacak!" {n}Leydi Rotacı, gözlerini yanan bir yıldızın ışığından korumaya çalışırcasına ellerini üzerlerine bastırıyor.{/n} "Üzgünüm fakat şu an merakını gidermem mümkün değil. Belki başka zaman."
languages.original_text: "Too... Too many colours. The hues flicker and intersperse, merging into a single wave. It's about to crash!" {n}The Lady Navigator presses her hands to her eyes as if to shield them from the light of a burning star.{/n} "Forgive me, but I cannot satisfy your curiosity at this time. Perhaps later."

traits.locale_text: "Çok... Çok fazla renk var. Renk tonları titreşip serpişiyor, birleşip tek bir dalga hâline geliyor. Parçalanmak üzere!" {n}Leydi Rotacı, gözlerini parlak bir güneşin ışığından korumaya çalışırcasına ellerini gözlerine bastırıyor.{/n} "Affedersin fakat şu an merakını gidermem mümkün değil. Belki başka zaman."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
